C

Cell - Class in edu.westmont.cs030.maze
Represents a cell of a maze, which may be a wall or path.
Cell(int, int) - Constructor for class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Cell
Construct a cell with the given and row and column indices regarding its location in a maze.
cells - Variable in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Maze
2D array of Cells to represent this maze.
colIndex() - Method in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Cell
Getter for c.
connectNeighbors(Cell, Cell) - Method in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Maze
Given two neighboring Cells, sets the Cell that is located between the neighbors as a path, thus connecting the two neighboring Cells together.

D

Direction - Enum Class in edu.westmont.cs030.maze
Four cardinal directions (north, east, south, and west) arranged in a clockwise order starting with north.

G

generateMaze() - Method in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.MazeGenerator
Initializes the Maze using Maze.initialize() then calls the recursive generateMaze(Cell) method with the initial Cell from the Maze to begin the path generation process from.
generateMaze(Cell) - Method in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.MazeGenerator
Recursive maze generation algorithm based on Wikipedia's description of the process.
getNeighbor(Cell, Direction) - Method in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Maze
Given a Cell, returns a neighboring Cell in the given Direction.
getNeighborColIndex(Direction, int) - Method in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Cell
Computes the column index of the neighbor in the given direction.
getNeighborRowIndex(Direction, int) - Method in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Cell
Computes the row index of the neighbor in the given direction.
getNeighbors(Cell) - Method in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Maze
Given a Cell, returns an ArrayList of Cell consisting of its neighbors in all Directions, as long as the neighbor(s) exist within the bounds of this maze.
getRenderTarget() - Method in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.MazeGenerator
Returns the GUI render target that was set at instantiation.
getText() - Method in class edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Cell
